ValidationRule.description: Lab Manager can only select "Data Entry" as the sub stage for File Preparation
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $Profile.Name = 'Lab Manager', TEXT(Claim_Stage__c) = 'File Preparation', ISCHANGED(Claim_Sub_Stage__c), TEXT(Claim_Sub_Stage__c) <> 'Data Entry' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not permitted to move to change the Claim Sub Stage to anything but "Data Entry"
